full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 191 of 262 1902 LC8VMAX6 Rodgers - cross 1 A. I think the Gulfstream was not an LLC; I think it was incorporated. And I think that the Boeing was an LLC. 2 Q. I'm sorry. Let me rephrase the question. 3 The two aircraft we're talking about, the Boeing and 4 the Gulfstream, were actually owned by companies? 5 A. Correct. 6 Q. I'll use that general term. Is that correct? 7 A. That's correct. 8 Q. Okay. So the companies that owned the planes were 9 controlled by Mr. Epstein, right? 10 A. Yes. 11 Q. But the actual owner on paper was a company; correct? 12 A. That is correct. 13 Q. Okay. So I think you recall that the Boeing 727 was owned 14 by JEGE, Incorporated, right? 15 A. Correct. 16 Q. And the Gulfstream was owned by a company called Hyperion 17 Air, right? 18 A. Correct. 19 Q. And I think Epstein also owned a Bell helicopter at some 20 point, didn't he? 21 A. Yes. 22 Q. Do you know about when he bought the Bell helicopter? 23 A. I believe it was 2002, maybe November 2002. 24 Q. Okay. That's a rough estimate? 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019053
